name: Spiralytics, Inc.
description: Spiralytics implements profitable marketing campaigns to help build their client's business. They implement online advertising, search engine optimization, and content marketing strategies backed by analytics and performance measurement to highlight the improvements. The Spiralytics Team has a passion for performance, metrics, constant improvement. They have diverse online marketing backgrounds tied together by a common “Plan Do Check Act” theme of continual process improvement.

locations.address: Zeta II Building 191 Salcedo St. Legazpi Village, Makati
